title: lol is this a fucking meme

replies.body: Gives you an extra second to think about what you could've done better as you walk back to lane?
Gives you an extra second to think why you didn't ban this champion.

Seriously, even though I wanna ban Blitzcrank, I wait to see if any of my allies ban Zoe. If they don't, I ban her.

Seriously, as a Sona main I would legit rather deal with a Blitzcrank all lane/game than deal with a Zoe. Fuck that.

FTFY
AS you practice your thinking, it only takes 0.25 seconds.
Dude just don´t get hit by her spells. Like at all and she becomes useless.
I agree. As long as you and your allies never get hit once by a bubble in a 20+ minute game she's basically useless.
my sarcasm detectors are going throught the Roof
glad to hear, you understand.
It's safe to assume the balance team doesn't know what they're doing.
nah this has to be the balance team telling us to go fuck ourselves LMAO
The poor balance team has to deal with all the monstrosities the designers create.
They don't deal very well..
RIot: Yep, now she's obviously balanced.

Community : Man she is doing entirely too much damage with her Q
Riot: We agree she is too strong right now, so we are adding 1 second to the CD on her Q, this will reduce her DPS numbers <3
Community:......................................... wut
It isn't even a full second...its only a full second AT LEVEL 1. Zoe maxes Q first, which means its only a .25 cooldown increase at level 9.
Probably because Zoe isn't actually that unbalanced and it's just casters and everyone else whining that finally a burst mage is doing their job?

Spammable burst

makes sense

There are cooldowns and also skill shots that you can actually dodge unlike autos.

If she was as much of a problem as everyone says she'd have a far more than slightly above average to average winrate. She's also hard to play successfully.
Her winrate is low because all her damage is on Q. If she misses it she's fucked. She's also still new. Let's not repeat {{champion:432}}'s release

>  If she misses it she's fucked.

Throws Q. Misses. Warps back to complete safety bcz used R. Repeat in 3 seconds.
Exactly, that's a problem. Burst should not be spammable, and she shouldn't be helpless for those 3 seconds.
uh oh, theres a 3 second window where you MIGHT be able to fight her! oh what a world!!

Moving damage from Q to literally ANYTHING ELSE is a change, not a nerf.

lul
Lul I only use other inaccurate sites not champion gg
From what I could find she's globally around 47-48%. That's according to lolalytics and leagueofgraphs.
She isn't hard to play. She is also pick or ban in competitive and in LCS it was proven she is broken. Unless you call oneshot from fog of war a god damn balanced gameplay.

> [{quoted}](name=T4underbolt,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9eUgLEX0,comment-id=0005000000000003,timestamp=2018-02-07T06:17:48.955+0000)
>
> She isn't hard to play. She is also pick or ban in competitive and in LCS it was proven she is broken. Unless you call oneshot from fog of war a god damn balanced gameplay.

I've watched plenty of pro games recently and I've seen times where she isn't pick or ban. Don't say "literally pick or ban" if she isn't.

And she IS hard to play, even casters who cast pro games and whine about her acknowledge that, when you can see people like faker mess up playing her a fair bit she definitely isn't easy.

Faker messes up a lot of plays. People just exaggerating that he is God never makes a single mistake. And currently SKT is not the best example to give. When she isnt pick or ban its about certain teamcomp and target bans. Nobody even thinks about zoe then, which doesnt change the fact in standard comps that are played 95% of the time she is priority to either pick or ban.

> [{quoted}](name=T4underbolt,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9eUgLEX0,comment-id=000500000000000300000000,timestamp=2018-02-07T11:40:47.810+0000)
>
> Faker messes up a lot of plays. People just exaggerating that he is God never makes a single mistake. And currently SKT is not the best example to give. When she isnt pick or ban its about certain teamcomp and target bans. Nobody even thinks about zoe then, which doesnt change the fact in standard comps that are played 95% of the time she is priority to either pick or ban.

And even then she still has a below average or average winrate in standard comps outside pro play.

Hell even in pro play if you wish the amount of Zoe mess ups I've seen is quite a bit, and it's not like the pick always works for teams. I haven't seen anything when she's picked that makes me think she's broken and statistics in solo Q echo that.

This is why this game will keep having broken champions. So many people are like you completely clueless about what actually balance is about. Win rate doesn't show if champion is broken or have a toxic design that doesnt allow for healthy gameplay or counterplay. 

Eat that example and understand: Leblanc back then when she had silence and was free win for every lane, having 0 counterplay had **45% winrate**. With your logic riot should ve buff her back then. Of course you can be one of those players who were saying she is completely fine and healthy, in that case we have nothing to discuss then since you lack any sense of balance. Though lets hope you actually understand that statistics means nothing. Just because champion is not winning games or can be not impactful in certain conditions doesnt mean that champion is fine.
Sejuani gets to have a massive 5+ seconds nerf on her Q, and then there's this....

A 3.4375 second cooldown spammable oneshot with two seconds of active hitboxes moves back all the way to a 3.575 second cooldown spammable oneshot with two seconds of active hitboxes? Surely this will be the change that finally makes her balanced.

While we're at balance tweaks for over or underpowered characters here's some more.

{{champion:13}} Base Attack Damage: 55 -> 56
{{champion:68}} E range: 850 -> 855
{{champion:78}} Base health 540 -> 542
{{champion:29}} Stealth mana cost 40 -> 42
{{champion:41}} Q cooldown 5s -> 5.2s
top kek

stop whining and learn to dodge a skillshot.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3_DPW8hKTI

Whenever there is baseless whining over Zoe, I will be there to correct it with the same phrase.

Yeah don't get hit once by anything she does in a 20+ minute game.

Seems legit, bruh.

> [{quoted}](name=An Enemy Sutando,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9eUgLEX0,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2018-02-07T10:14:06.335+0000)
>
> Yeah don't get hit once by anything she does in a 20+ minute game.
> 
> Seems legit, bruh.

this applies to any burst mage with a combo set up. If you are getting hit by Q and she didn't E you first and you aren't CCed? Then you deserve that Q that is going to pound you right but that butt, plus if its in in charged Q? who cares? Unslingshoted Q's do crap damage.. Q is easy to dodge, E into Q gives you time to get distance and force her Q to fall short or to get behind something or someone.
You missed the point. It doesn't matter how bad the Zoe player is at landing her bubble, she only needs to get lucky enough to land a single one to 100-0 you.

> [{quoted}](name=An Enemy Sutando,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9eUgLEX0,comment-id=000c000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-07T12:21:48.012+0000)
>
> You missed the point. It doesn't matter how bad the Zoe player is at landing her bubble, she only needs to get lucky enough to land a single one to 100-0 you.

{{champion:53}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:99}} 

All of theses can do the same thing in the same amount of time as zoe and it just takes ONE count them ONE fuck up against them to end up dead or in blitz's case pulled into a bad place and get gang banged. Ironically Zoe has MORE counter play then all these except for lux.

there is literally NO champion comparable to Zoe with her amount of bullshit. If Blitz could redirect his Q mid fire the world would be imploding. Illaoi has 3 spells she uses to kill people, maybe 4, AND she's melee. Annie uses her ultimate (btw any champion that has an ultimate attached to their burst is already 100 times less bullshit than Zoe). Fizz 1 hit is delayed without R unless he's SO fed he doesn't need the triple damage W. Nidalee has to go melee to combo you. Wukong is subpar and ONLY a problem if he gets fed early game and nobody on the enemy team is a tank (melee assassin xdddd). As much as I hate Orianna she's still not doing 85% of your health bar in one spell from 800 range. Diana is a melee assassin, next. Lux uses R.

The only "counterplay" to Zoe is staying behind creeps so she doesn't bubble you, but that option is gone once she hits 6(or she one hits your ranged creeps with one Q), teleports on top of you, and point blank bubbles you in the face. Zoe has no window to be fought with her non-existent cooldown on her one ability that is front-loaded with all her damage.

The problem is, that Zoe really doesn't get to nuke you *and* redirect it. She throws it forward? She can redirect if she misses, but she gets far, far lower damage.

She launches it backwards? She gets to nuke you, but she gets no redirection. In fact, she's essentially giving you *more* time to react that way.

Her "You're fucked" spell isn't her Q. It's her E. It doesn't kill you by itself, but, like Blitz's Q, Heimer's E, Annie's passive, Fizz's R, Diana's Q, and Lux's Q, it means you're *going* to die to the rest of her kit.

---

The reason Zoe does 85% of your health with one spell? Because her one spell has to do the damage of 85% of a mage's kit. She has one large damaging ability: Q. Her E just sets up her Q. Her R just enhances her Q (and helps with passive). Her W is very low damage (even if she gets a Gunblade drop, it's not a massive amount of her damage). Her passive is more to CS than anything.

So she has to have an entire kit's worth of damage in one ability. If all of Lux's damage was in her Q, it'd be the exact same thing.

https://clips.twitch.tv/HungrySpookyLorisTBCheesePull

you're fucked

but you right dude it's her E

How the fuck didn't he dodge that? That was pathetically easy to dodge.

If Zoe doesn't land her E, you shouldn't be *hit* by her Q. That's a *bronze level mistake*. It's worse than being hit by a Lux R without her landing Q, or even landing E.
probably because she was two screens away and it's broken hitbox didnt touch him but blew him up anyways. but you're right. it's her E
